name: Friendly Voices Phone Buddies for Seniors
description: Weekly volunteer phone calls offering supportive listening and confidentiality for isolated, homebound seniors age 60+
fullDescription: Friendly Voices connects isolated and homebound seniors with trained volunteer phone buddies for weekly friendly conversations, reducing loneliness and providing social connection.
whatTheyOffer:
- Weekly volunteer phone calls
- Supportive listening
- Complete confidentiality
- Consistent phone buddy match
- Reduces isolation and loneliness
- Free service for seniors 60+
howToGetIt:
1. Visit Friendly Voices website
2. Sign up as a senior participant
3. Complete brief intake form
4. Get matched with volunteer buddy
5. Receive weekly phone calls
6. Build ongoing friendship
